sense.name: indulge in, usually with pleasure
sense.examples: Jeanie wallowed in self-pity after her break up. Francis wallowed in pleasure during her massage. Stockbrokers wallow in delight when their investments go up. Jermaine wallowed in the success of his party.

sense.name: roll around
sense.examples: Pigs wallow in the mud to cool off. Dogs wallow in garbage to cover their scent. Sharon wallowed in the gigantic bathtub.

sense.name: rise up as if in waves
sense.examples: Smoke wallowed up from the burning building. Steam wallowed from the boiling pot. Dust wallowed around their feet as they walked through the desert.
